alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:42AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lafayette, central Jefferson, northeastern Taylor and Madison Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1042 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Monticello to 21 miles southwest of Madison to near Perry. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Madison, Perry, Greenville, Lee, Pinland, Ebb, Lamont, Hamburg, Buckville, Pinetta, Eridu, Nash, Waukeenah, Foley, Hanson, Perry-Foley Airport, Hampton Springs, Sirmans, Shady Grove and Iddo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida.
